statements: SELECT * FROM ecotourism_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, tour_date, num_participants FROM ecotourism_reservations ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, special_requests FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE num_participants > 5;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE special_requests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT tour_date, num_participants FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 100;
SELECT tour_date, num_participants FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE num_participants > 5 ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, tour_date, num_participants, special_requests FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE special_requests IS NOT NULL AND num_participants > 10;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY reservation_id;
SELECT reservation_id, num_participants, tour_date FROM ecotourism_reservations WHERE special_requests LIKE '%vegetarian%' ORDER BY tour_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, tour_date FROM reservations WHERE number_of_participants > 5;
SELECT reservation_id, number_of_participants FROM reservations ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT participant_name, email, phone_number FROM participants WHERE reservation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE tour_date >= '2022-01-01' AND number_of_participants > 5 ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, number_of_participants, special_requests FROM reservations WHERE special_requests IS NOT NULL ORDER BY reservation_id;
SELECT p.participant_name, r.tour_date FROM participants p JOIN reservations r ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id WHERE p.email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY r.tour_date ASC;

SELECT r.reservation_id, COUNT(p.participant_id) as total_participants FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN participants p ON r.reservation_id = p.reservation_id GROUP BY r.reservation_id HAVING total_participants >= 3 ORDER BY total_participants DESC;

SELECT r.reservation_id, p.participant_name, p.email FROM reservations r JOIN participants p ON r.reservation_id = p.reservation_id WHERE r.tour_date = (SELECT MIN(tour_date) FROM reservations) ORDER BY r.reservation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, tour_date, number_of_participants FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT tour_name, tour_location FROM tours;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT r.reservation_id, r.tour_date, c.first_name, c.last_name, t.tour_name FROM reservations r, customers c, tours t WHERE r.reservation_id = 1 AND c.customer_id = 1 AND t.tour_id = 1;

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.number_of_participants, c.first_name, c.last_name, t.tour_location FROM reservations r, customers c, tours t WHERE r.tour_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND c.customer_id = 2 AND t.tour_location = 'New York';
SELECT r.reservation_id, r.special_requests, t.tour_name FROM reservations r JOIN tours t ON r.reservation_id = t.tour_id WHERE r.special_requests IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, r.number_of_participants, t.tour_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN reservations r ON c.customer_id = r.reservation_id LEFT JOIN tours t ON r.tour_id = t.tour_id ORDER BY c.last_name DESC, r.number_of_participants ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, number_of_participants, tour_date FROM reservations;
SELECT tour_name, tour_location FROM tours WHERE tour_guide = 'John Smith';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, tour_name, reservation_id FROM bookings ORDER BY reservation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE tour_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT booking_id, reservation_id, customer_id, tour_id FROM bookings WHERE reservation_id = 1001;
SELECT tour_name, tour_location FROM tours WHERE tour_guide = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2001;
SELECT * FROM tours;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tours;
SELECT tour_name, max_participants FROM tours WHERE max_participants > 10;
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tours WHERE max_participants > 15;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tours WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT guide_name, experience_years, specialties FROM guides WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT tour_id, tour_name, start_date, end_date, max_participants FROM tours WHERE tour_name LIKE '%Adventure%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
